title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Terrebonne, Oregon
content:
Photo submitted by Charles Kim, “Spring break ride near Terrebonne, OR, at the top of Smith Rock which is a very popular rock climbing destination.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in […]

author: Kristi Benedict
